title.rendered: Aerolineas Argentinas (Airline) in Chinatown Point, Singapore

content.rendered:
Aerolineas Argentinas Airlines, formally Aerolineas Argentinas S.A., is Argentina’s largest airline and the country’s flag carrier.The airline was created in 1949 from the merger of four companies, and started operations in December 1950. Aerolineas Argentinas and its sister company Austral Lineas Aereas operates from two hubs, both located in Buenos Aires: Aeroparque Jorge Newbery and Ministro Pistarini International Airport.

 

Aerolineas Argentinas Airlines Chinatown Point, Singapore Address:
133 New Bridge Road,14-05 – Chinatown Point – Singapore – 059413

Phone:
65-6538-0282

Email: joyce.tan@maple.com.sg

Working hours
Mon to Fri from 09:00 AM to 05:30 PM

Aerolineas Argentinas Airlines Official website: http://www.aerolineas.com.ar/

Aerolineas Argentinas Airlines Online Check-in: www.aerolineas.com/in/gb/online check-in

Note: Check In online Aerolineas Argentinas Airlines Check-in between 2 and 36 hours prior to flight departure time.

Check Aerolineas Argentinas Airlines schedule here: www.aerolineas.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Aerolineas Argentinas Airlines flight status here: www.aerolineas.com/in/gb/flight status
